page.title: 04CYCLING
page.content: Cycling. Cycling was one of the projects offered during project week. This consisted of taking some twenty five pupils (mainly boys only four girls took part) on day long rides from the school. Each pupil was equipted with a five or ten speed bicycle (this was important as many of the gradients in this area are over one in seven). A day trip would start at about ten A.M.and finish at three thirty. During the day the group would cycle about thirty five miles along minor roads. The aim of this project was to provide pupils with an insight into their own environment.
